attributes.action: Make suicide prevention a compulsory part of the curriculum in Secondary Schools
attributes.additional_details: School staff should receive appropriate training in suicide prevention.
attributes.background: Suicide prevention to become a compulsory part of the Relationships and Sex Education (RSE) and Health Education curriculum in secondary schools. Ideally, an accredited Level 2 qualification should be accessible, free of charge, for all secondary school students.
